name: Mafia
content:
files:
- setup_mafia: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/GOG Games/Mafia/Setup.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: vcrun6
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    executable: $setup_mafia
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: LS3D_setup
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Illusion Softworks\Mafia
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    type: REG_BINARY
    value: 14 00 00 05 00 00 00 04 00 00 20 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00
      00 00 01 00 01 00 01 01 00 01 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 80 3f 00 00 80 3f 02 00 00
      00 02 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 02 00 00 00
winesteam:
  overrides:
    winegstreamer: disabled
